articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says Ferrari have "absolutely every ingredient to win" as the team launch the car he hopes will take him to an eighth world title.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton: 'I'm still acclimatising but it feels like a car I'm getting on well with'

articles.description: Paris St-Germain move into the last 16 of the Champions League with a thumping 10-0 aggregate victory over Brest.
articles.title: PSG 7-0 Brest: French champions stroll into last 16 with 10-0 aggregate win

articles.description: Bundesliga side Borussia Dortmund clinch their spot in the Champions League last 16 despite a goalless draw against Sporting in the second leg of their knockout play-off tie.
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund 0-0 Sporting: German side seal last-16 spot after second-leg draw

articles.description: Former world number one Venus Williams is given a wildcard for next month's Indian Wells in what would be her first match for almost a year.
articles.title: Venus Williams: American, 44, given wildcard at Indian Wells despite not playing match in almost a year

articles.description: Centuries from Tom Latham and Will Young take New Zealand to a convincing 60-run win over hosts Pakistan in Champions Trophy opener.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025 results: New Zealand cruise past Pakistan with Tom Latham and Will Young tons

articles.description: Emma Raducanu was targeted by a man who "exhibited fixated behaviour" during her second-round loss to Karolina Muchova in Dubai, the WTA says.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: British player targeted by man who 'exhibited fixated behaviour'
